text: Brave New World is an album by Iron Maiden. It is the band's twelfth studio album, and it was released on 30th May of 2000. The album was recorded in Paris, France. And it was produced by Kevin Shirley. It has sold around 307,000 copies in the USA. It received many good reviews.One person who reviewed it said that "its excellence was undeniable." ==Musicians== * Bruce Dickinson - vocals * Janick Gers - guitar * Steve Harris - bass guitar * Nicko McBrain - percussion * Dave Murray - guitar * Adrian Smith - guitar ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Iron Maiden albums
title: Brave New World (album)
